Irish Melodies
Lydney, Gloucestershire March contest - 1st Cory, 2nd Drybrook. Prizes - 1st £40 and cup, 2nd £20, 3rd £10. 5 bands competed.
July 11, 2016, 2:59 p.m. March 18, 2020, 3:48 p.m.
1 A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band J. A. Greenwood
2 Cory Band Walter B. Hargreaves
3 Lewis Merthyr Band Oliver Jones
